columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the role.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the role.

columns.name: role_id
columns.description: The stable and unique string identifying the role.

columns.name: create_date
columns.description: The date and time when the role was created.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A user-provided description of the role.

columns.name: instance_profile_arns
columns.description: A list of instance profiles associated with the role.

columns.name: max_session_duration
columns.description: The maximum session duration (in seconds) for the specified role. Anyone who uses the AWS CLI, or API to assume the role can specify the duration using the optional DurationSeconds API parameter or duration-seconds CLI parameter.

columns.name: permissions_boundary_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the policy used to set the permissions boundary for the role.

columns.name: role_last_used_region
columns.description: Contains the region in which the IAM role was used.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags that are attached to the role.

columns.name: inline_policies
columns.description: A list of policy documents that are embedded as inline policies for the role..

columns.name: inline_policies_std
columns.description: Inline policies in canonical form for the role.

columns.name: attached_policy_arns
columns.description: A list of managed policies attached to the role.

columns.name: assume_role_policy
columns.description: The policy that grants an entity permission to assume the role.

columns.name: assume_role_policy_std
columns.description: Contains the assume role policy in a canonical form for easier searching.
